69 enum class XLContentType {

71 WorkbookMacroEnabled,
72 Worksheet,
73 Chartsheet,

75 Theme,
76 Styles,

86 ExtendedProperties,
87 CustomProperties,
88 Comments,
89 Table,
90 VMLDrawing,
91 Unknown
92 };
